yacl3.config.ntr:config.disableTextureRo: Disables texture rotations based on their position
yacl3.config.ntr:config.disableOffsets.d: Disables blocks like flowers position being offset based on their position
yacl3.config.ntr:config.mode.description:
Configures the mode of rotations/offset modifications.
1. No Rotations: all blocks have the same rotation and offset
2. Secure Random: a new secure random seed is generated for every block
3. Random Offset: a random number generated on client launch is added to the rotation/offset function. Use with caution, this offset can be reversed if you show coordinates of block rotations during the game session.
